channel.title: NFS on The Grinnell College Digital Library Application Developer's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in NFS on The Grinnell College Digital Library Application Developer's Blog

item.title: Moving Omeka-S Data to NFS
item.description: Grinnell’s dockerized version of Omeka-S has been running for several weeks now, and we recently ran out of disk space for object data on the host, a CentOS node we named DGDocker2. My posts 041, Configuring DGDocker2 and 042, My dockerized-server Config address the original configuration of DGDocker2 in detail. Omeka-S is configured on DGDocker2 to reside in /opt/omeka-s-docker, and inside that directory is a subdirectory named volume. The portions of the application stack that deliver Omeka-S are configured largely in /opt/omeka-s-docker/docker-compose.
